ingredients.item: 1 pack 12 Heston from Waitrose 12 Mini Chicken, Leek & Ham Hock Pies

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ÂºC, gas mark 6. Cook the pies according to pack instructions. Mix all of the mayonnaise ingredients in a bowl until well combined. Spoon into a small bowl and serve alongside the warm pies.
